casebody.data:
Ron METCALF, Head of Household
v.
GRAHAM COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES No. 71P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Ron David Metcalf, for Metcalf, Ron, et al. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Graham County Department of Social Services.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 12th of March 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Graham County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of March 2018 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of March 2018 by Plaintiff to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
